trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Berlin
There were no other sightings in Berlin on or around February 13th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going to work this morning, and those bright, neon-green like objects were rapidly going by, moving horizontally at a spastic speed, but lasted only seconds....they seemed to just disintegrate in the air!!! They seemed to be "twinkling" like stars, and were going really fast..... What caught my eye was the pretty colors... At first, I thought it was some aircraft, but nothing like that was arouns was flying around.... Just gave me a feeling like "WOW, what did I just witness?" Never saw anything like that in all of my 60 years!! People say it was just a reflection from the sun rising, or a reflection off of my windshield, etc...but the sun was not out yet. It was still cloudy, except where some of the sky was really clear, and that is where I saw those lights!!!!!!!!! Pretty wild....... Unfortunately, I did not have anything to take pictures with..that's the first thing I said to myself--"Wish I had a camera!"
Summary: bright green, twinkling-like stars, rapid and moving horizontally
